== Introduction ==
Greetings,
I am putting together a customized derivative of Ubuntu called Pine OS.

== Contact Information ==
Mike Ferland - cpujockey@gmail.com

== Audience ==
Home Users, workstations and mobile.

== Mission ==
Provide a friendly and useful Linux experience.

== Goals ==
* R1 - Ambling Alp - Establish UI theme, packages and base system. 
* R2 - Burning Bridge - Enhance user experience and squash R1 bugs... 
* R3 - Charming Centurion - TBD

If you would like to help out, let me know.
